de: Tourismuscampingplatz mit 3 Sternen. 65 Stellplätze, 34 Wohnanlagen, 7 Mietunterkünfte, 17 nackte Stellplätze (Wohnmobil, Wohnwagen, Zelt), 7 Wohnmobile. Ruhiger und familiärer Campingplatz. In der Nähe der Velomaritime gelegen. Bushaltestelle der Linien 24 und 13 in 150 m Entfernung.
en:
In a countryside area 3.5 km from the beach, between Le Havre and Etretat, come and discover this campsite with a family atmosphere and enjoy the peace and the greenery of the site.

3-star tourism campsite. 66 pitches, 27 residences, 7 rentals, 17...
it: Campeggio turistico a 3 stelle. 65 piazzole, 34 residence, 7 affitti, 17 piazzole scoperte (camper, caravan, tenda), 7 camper. Campeggio tranquillo e familiare. Situato vicino alla vélomaritime. Fermata dell'autobus linea 24 e 13 a 150 metri.
fr: Camping tourisme 3 étoiles. 65 emplacements, 34 résidences, 7 locatifs, 17 emplacements nus (camping-car, caravane, tente), 7 camping-cars. Camping calme et familial. Situé près de la vélomaritime. Arrêt de bus ligne 24 et 13 à 150 mètres.
es: Camping turístico de 3 estrellas. 65 parcelas, 34 residencias, 7 alquileres, 17 parcelas desnudas (autocaravana, caravana, tienda), 7 autocaravanas. Camping tranquilo y familiar. Situado cerca del vélomaritime. Parada de autobús de las líneas 24 y 13 a 150 metros.
nl: 3-sterren toeristische camping. 65 standplaatsen, 34 woningen, 7 huuraccommodaties, 17 vrije standplaatsen (camper, caravan, tent), 7 campers. Rustige en familiale camping. Gelegen bij het vélomaritime. Bushalte lijn 24 en 13 op 150 meter.

In a countryside area 3.5 km from the beach, between Le Havre and Etretat, come and discover this campsite with a family atmosphere and enjoy the peace and the greenery of the site.

3-star tourism campsite. 66 pitches, 27 residences, 7 rentals, 17 bare pitches (camper, caravan, tent), 7 camper vans. Quiet and family campsite.

Located near the Vélomaritime. Bus line 13 and 24 stop 150 meters away. Rental of 3 electric bikes.
